==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|わ|よう|せつ|ちゅう|k3=せっ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|わよう せっちゅう|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-pos|idiom|わよう せっちゅう}}
# an appropriate blend of the best of Japanese and Western concepts
